<rule id="javaee-technology-usage-00110" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <javaclass references="javax.validation.constraints.{*}">
                    <location>IMPORT</location>
                </javaclass>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <classification category-id="information" effort="0" title="Bean Validation">
                    <description>The application uses Bean Validation</description>
                </classification>
                <technology-tag level="INFORMATIONAL">Bean Validation</technology-tag>
            </perform>
        </rule>
